name: Salammbo: Battle for Carthage
description:
Salammbô: Les Périls de Carthage.
Version française sur deux CDs.
content:
appid: 301670
published: false
script:
  game:
    exe: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/The Adventure Company/Salammb\xF4/Salammbo.exe"
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
  installer:
  - insert_disc:
      message: "Veuillez ins\xE9rer le CD No. 1"
      requires: Install.exe
  - task:
      description: "Cr\xE9ation du pr\xE9fixe Wine."
      name: create_prefix
      prefix: $GAMEDIR/
  - task:
      description: Installation du jeu.
      executable: $DISC/Install.exe
      name: wineexec
      prefix: $GAMEDIR
  - insert_disc:
      message: "Veuillez ins\xE9rer le CD No. 2"
      requires: Salammbo.cd2
  - copy:
      dst: $GAMEDIR/CD2
      src: $DISC
  - execute:
      command: ln -s "../CD2" "$GAMEDIR/dosdevices/d:"
      description: Lien au repertoire CD2.
wine:
  arch: win32
